channel.title: Why do I always get an error when compiling? Please help me
channel.description:
When I compile the .bat file i always end up getting this line
" 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. "
Please help me solve this problem. PS: noob here.

item.title: Why do I always get an error when compiling? Please help me

item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

have you edited the .bat so its your current java?
have you changed the path in your enviromental variables?
